entity.name: President Trump announces ‘hard hitting’ sanctions on Iran
entity.description: President Trump said he’s imposing sanctions on Iran’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, and his office, “in response to Iran’s increasingly provocative actions.” The announcement comes after Iran shot down a US Navy drone last week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump @greggutfeld How is Jared's Mideast peace plan going?  and your new China deal and your new Iran deal and North Korea deal and infrastructure and healthcare...........not to mention the Debt and Deficit and the biggie...your Coronavirus screwup
You are incompetent
